params._amounts: The list of the amounts of tokens in basic units to airdrop.
params._tokens: The list of tokens to airdrop. TRUSTED

changeGovernor(address).details: Change the governor of the contract.

params._governor: The address of the new governor. TRUSTED

params._recipient: The new contract indicating if an address is a recipient.

changeToken(uint256,address,uint256).details: Change a token and amount. To be used to replace a token (for example after the market result is known).

params._i: The index of the token to change.
params._token: The new token. If the address is null, no token will be given. TRUSTED

claim().details: Claim the tokens. The recipient must already be registered and shouldn't have claimed yet.

params._recipient: The contract indicating if an address is a recipient. TRUSTED
